website_summaries.verdict: Plenty of gear included at a low price so you can start playing a bingo game with dozens of players.
pros: Kit includes 100 unique bingo cards and 1,000 see-through chips
Rather than using a hopper or cage to select bingo numbers, this kit includes playing card sized calling cards with the 75 bingo numbers on them
Kit is relatively small for easy transport
cons: Some prefer a ping pong ball style of calling numbers
No board to track called numbers

customer_reviews.title: These were great, but be advised
customer_reviews.text: These were great, but be advised, we made a rookie mistake and added these to an existing pack to allow for more people to play. This actually backfired and we had multiple winners each round as it put two duplicate cards in play. luckly we had extra prizes and instituted a "first to the table" rule, but wanted others to be advised.
customer_reviews.author: sjbzher

customer_reviews.title: This is SOOOO much better and you can hold the card up and people ...
customer_reviews.text: So I originally had the Bingo set that has a cage and multiple little numbered and lettered balls. The small balls are hard to keep track of and the kids always wanted to play with the cage...therefore we lost quite a few. This is SOOOO much better and you can hold the card up and people can see the letter/number. Great price and good value. I'm glad I went with the reviews and chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: priteshkumar b mistry

customer_reviews.title: Great Game for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I work at a daycare center and I needed something for the older kids to do when they get out of school, so I thought this was good idea. It's absolutely perfect for them. I usually have about 10-15 of them playing at once for a prize. They now ask me everyday when they see me to play bingo. Seeing them get excited over a game they thought they would hate is amazing. I'm so grateful that it comes with chips as well! It makes the game and cleanup easier. Definitely recommend for family game night or a classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra C.

customer_reviews.title: ... Ministry Team at my church had planned a "Women's Fun Day" and had come up with some ideas for ...
customer_reviews.text: The Women's Ministry Team at my church had planned a "Women's Fun Day" and had come up with some ideas for games. Naturally, bingo was a game mentioned and I had went from store to store trying to find a game adequate enough for a large group. Finally I realized I would have to go on-line. When I saw this, the description was what I was looking for, and since I had an Amazon gift card, I purchased it. My church sisters loved it!!! The colored cards and large print numbers were perfect for the elder sisters and the quantity of cards allowed for many to have at least 2-3. I'm so glad it bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Bingo Set for the elderly residents at Senior Living Facilities. Some of the residents are hard at hearing, so the big sturdy cards are great for them to see the number and letter called. When comparing it to other bingo sets, this one is definitely number one. I'm surprised this isn't a best seller on Amazon. The chips are clear which allows the residents to see through to the number and make sure they put it on the right one. The different colored cards are perfect to add some cheery color on dreary days. I'm not big on giving five stars, but I really do love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lovett

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bingo set! I love using the number cards vs those tiny little balls where the numbers eventually wear off. It's so easy to shuffle the deck and lay them out to see what numbers have been called. The number cards and playing cards are thick and laminated so they will last a long time. We played bingo at work 10 times with 20 players each time and none of the cards show any wear or tear.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: As described and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had this version of Bingo. The only other thing you need is a board to mark the letters and numbers called already when checking someone's Bingo win. As described. Really nice to not have to deal with little balls and a cage and instead shuffle cards and draw them. I plan to play a game at my house and we will reuse this game a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ariadne Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice set, but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bingo set, but the packaging is not. Even if the seller bought the components to this game in bulk, it could have been assembled into some inexpensive box and a nice logo created for it. It pretty much comes in a ziplock bag. Otherwise, it is nice. Using cards to call the numbers is unique and kind of cool and you don't have to mess with a cage of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Fun Times Were Had By All
customer_reviews.text: Based on the advice of other reviewers, I opted for this version of Bingo for our Christmas Eve party fun. It was a big hit. Everyone was able to manage being the caller with no issues. The only drawback is we had people all over the living room, some of whom were sitting on the floor. There were a few of the colored chips that missed getting picked up so we were finding them the following day. However, that was a minor inconvenience for the amount of fun the game provided.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Runner

customer_reviews.title: XCELLENT VALUE 4 your $
customer_reviews.text: The jumbo bingo ball cards make it very easy for everyone to see, and the 1,000 see thru multi-colored bingo chips are great quality. The 100 assorted bingo cards are study but not heavy/bulky and they sit perfectly flat. I recently bought 20 wooden bingo cards at .99¢/per card plus $4.99/deck of bingo cards and no chips. As you can see from the price of this fabulous package, it is an EXCELLENT value for your money! The seller sent updated emails regarding my purchase and shipment (tyvm) and shipped item immediately.
customer_reviews.author: June Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our games
customer_reviews.text: We have an annual breakfast for our Honor Flight Veterans and guests. Last year we implemented games but the bingo cards we used were too small for some of our players to read. This bingo set was worth the investment and will be able to use for years to come. While not large print cards, they were plenty large for all to see and play. Perfect addition to our games. They all enjoyed so much I might have to buy additional cards as the crowd increases. They all like to play!
customer_reviews.author: lscillini

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for a great game night!
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I LOVE this bingo game I got. The cars are so sturdy and they last. The chips are perfect and fun... I love that it comes with the caller cards. We don't use them at home because we have an app that calls the numbers for you, but we can take the game camping or on vacation and use the caller cards for out of town fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: A really good set-good value
customer_reviews.text: It was a really great set. I love the idea of cards with the BINGO numbers on them instead of the little balls that get lost so easily. Also being able to hold up the card so all can see the number saves a lot of repeating the numbers. All the items were made of good quality materials. I was very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with One Exception
customer_reviews.text: This is less cumbersome than having to place on the table a cage with the balls, and it brings fun to our family, especially an older family member who is home ridden. Only drawback is that the boards a bit too thin, and the cards a bit too large to shuffle. Not regretting purchasing though!
customer_reviews.author: ladyc

customer_reviews.title: Like everyone else that left a positive review I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else that left a positive review I have to do the same! This is the way to go when playing Bingo. I reviewed so many of the ball machines and couldn't find one to my liking. This is easy to play with and no hassle of spinning balls around or losing them. Very nice quality too! I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Super for 98 year old with stroke and memory issues
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves Bingo. Now we can play just two or three people without the balls and cage. Good stroke therapy for her to turn and call out the sturdy cards. Great for our short term memory situation where she has trouble with big group bingo. Plastics ducats to put on the cards are very thin. We had to discard the very lightly colored ones, but there are hundreds anyway. Total game fits in a gallon bag! Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: JK Graves

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good quality bingo set for family use but didn’t want to have to pay a small fortune for a game. This was a super cheap option that allows a lot of players to take part in a game! The cards, in lieu of balls, are a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Brown

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly Game
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set to use at our church picnic for the senior citizens. They were able to play the game very easily because the print was large enough for them to see the numbers and the clear markers made the game use friendly. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great large gathering game
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to play at Christmas. I like how it has the number card so if people can’t hear you they can see the numbers being called. I love how everything is included and more than enough for everyone. The whole family enjoyed it (5-75 yo)
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Great Bingo Set!
customer_reviews.text: This bingo set is of excellent quality. The chips & bingo boards are plentiful. I enjoy having the bingo cards over the cage & ball making this set travel friendly & easier to put away. Plus each player can take turns calling out a card. Awesome game set.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: The Bingo set to get
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our family gatherings & is easily stored till next time. I will say that the little cover “coins” or “chips” or whatever you call them are hard to see when they get tossed in the floor! 😂 (Maybe there was too much excitement!🤷🏻‍♀️)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal! I used this for a family party for 75 people. And other times as well. I really like using the cards to make the calls because they are quick and don’t roll off the table. I’d highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JaLee Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for work.
customer_reviews.text: We did a Christmas bingo game for the weeks in December for my husbands whole department. It was a big hit. The cards are way better than bingo balls and we just stuck the cards on his office door so everyone could see what the numbers drawn for that day were.
customer_reviews.author: MamaWingReads

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great game!!! Everything look durable, planning a lot of "Zoom-type" fun-times with this game. They arrived when expected. Would purchase again if needed. Great game for game players.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond D. Sherrod

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: So fun my mother and aunts and even the young people loved it at family reunion all it need is a sheet to put a tab on for numbers called so you don’t have to go back through all the cards to check bingos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now all can play
customer_reviews.text: Deaf folk have no problem playing this game. The call back is trickey but can be done. Just have 2 leaders, caller and checker. And off you go, fun ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to play bingo with my students as a reward, and it worked out terrifically. The calling cards are so easy to use. Also, the boards are not flimsy and are meant to be re-used. Great price for all that comes in the set!
customer_reviews.author: Maryam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties of all sizes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this specifically to play at the wellness and recovery center where I work. With the cards, we were able to complete multiple games within a shorter period of time without having to deal with the cage and the little balls!!! Awesome. Easy to read cards!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaanine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Option to Playing Bingo Without the Rolling Balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for a classroom bingo. I didn’t want one with the rolling balls. Being able to shuffle cards and draw work so much better. Components are so so. But overall it’s a really nice package for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Bingo cards are the way to go! So much easier to transport than the cage and balls. They fit into a purse or large pocket and have nice big letters/numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Olds

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love that you get a huge assortment of Bingo cards and chips. The cards and chips are a little thinner than I like but overall I love it. I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Doris T

customer_reviews.title: Good value, fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Received very quickly after ordering. This is a great value for the price. We play with the grandkids in the mornings before school. Because Bingo is so flexible, we can have short games (1 row) or longer (blackout). I like having the cards instead of the metal cage - makes it easier to store. The "calling" cards are rather large though and because of that, harder to shuffle.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of everyone being able to see the ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet but they are as described in marketing information. Will be used during a high school class social. I like the idea of everyone being able to see the number being called. The chips are a little light weight but should work well with card placed on a stable surface.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn O. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Love them but the cards were stuck together when I got them. Therefore some of them were ripped when I was trying to get them unstuck.
customer_reviews.author: becca28472

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of materials
customer_reviews.text: This had plenty of materials for my class of 27 students. I use this set to practice signing numbers 1-75 in American Sign Language. It had everything I needed for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: GallyGirl12

customer_reviews.title: Bingo Fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, cards are very sturdy. Little learning curve to shuffle them. Lots of fun, plus you don't have to worry about little bingo balls rolling away.
customer_reviews.author: Brachule

customer_reviews.title: B I N G O !
customer_reviews.text: A must buy! The words are very big (EASY TO READ) and thick, which is a plus. This is a great game for family and friends and also for the Church youth group to play.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice card stock. Needed more chips when playing some versions of Bingo - most of the cards in this set were being played ((large group)
customer_reviews.author: Ladybugnc44

customer_reviews.title: We loved it...
customer_reviews.text: Love it me and kids played it few times and they love it alot better then the big bingo cage the only thing I would change on it is to make the cards a little smaller kinda hard to shuffle but I still give it a 10 that's not a big deal can't wait to take camping to play with the whole family..
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for virtual bingo
customer_reviews.text: got this set to use for a virtual work bingo. the bingo calling cards were perfect Large size is the perfect size to use showed on the camera clearly so there was no guessing what the number was. we tried to use a bingo cage ball set and the numbers were to small for everyone to see. we had 35 people playing
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great extra cards
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cards so we would have enough for our senor bingo night at church. Easy to read and durable. Works very well, sipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: It is easy and fun to play; all of the pieces were easy to use; nothing complicated; just like I like it at my age (68) (smile).
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hill

customer_reviews.title: which was fine. Chips
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly as as advertised. No-frills packing, which was fine. Chips, draw cards & play cards are colorful and attractive. Cards are of decent thickness. Should last for a reasonable time with reasonable care. Practical & portable, once I select a carrier. Perhaps an empty large cookie tin? 3 resealable plastic baggies should do the trick to keep contents organized..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bingo!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this version of Bingo....the cards are easy to read and large enough that anyone can call the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in gift ability of item
customer_reviews.text: Was Disappointed to receive a Ziploc baggie containing three additional bags in it with chips, Playing cards, and bingo cards. No box or game instructions were provided Making it non-giftable.
customer_reviews.author: Yogagirltoo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the numbers, very big and visible even for those with poor eye sight. The chips are clear and had smooth edges. This bingo set is used for family and friends gatherings which we have quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for kids and adults as well.
customer_reviews.text: I like that my grandkids want to play bingo and we do not need a ball cage and all those little balls that roll everywhere. I don't have to worry about losing a ball that they might find and then get chocked.
customer_reviews.author: Judy T.

customer_reviews.title: Many numbers missing
customer_reviews.text: Half of the numbers from the letter N are missing. Otherwise, nice. I like the portability of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna2016

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Children's Fellowship Night at our church - love the card concept, much easier to use when you have a commotion going on!
customer_reviews.author: Brown fox

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This set is really great quality! I thought the cards would be flimsy and cheap for the price. It was not! They are very sturdy and well made. I could see this set lasting for years to come. Having the calling cards instead of balls is so much nicer as well. Makes for easy storage which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Bingo was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a small group of people of all ages to play at a party. Everyone loved it. Love the cards to call from. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley L Waiau

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect for our family reunion "Candy Bar bingo". All other sets I saw had 100 bingo cards, but they were not 100 DIFFERENT cards. It all comes in a big Ziploc plastic bag...no bulky box to deal with. Great heavy weight bingo cards, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: loved the large print cards and the large call cards can be used for deft people, too.
customer_reviews.text: My relative said she called out Bingo for deft people and I told her about these cards that can be seen across a room. So hopefully more people will use these cards for Bingo.
customer_reviews.author: Granny T

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bruhhhhhhh...I love it, we love it...Cards are big and seems to be a hit with the fam. I needed them for an event i have coming up and these will do the trick. We have played with them every night since ive received them. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Crun Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my senior group
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in perfect condition. I like this Bingo set because it doesn't use a cage that can break, or balls that can get lost. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Fast.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging had a little to be desired but if it kept the cost down it was worth it. The cards are not the stiff hard board type yet still presentable. I was pleased. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, all excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on trip to visit family in chicago and we all enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this set yet, but I think it will be perfect for teaching numbers in the ASL classes I teach at various elementary grade levels.
customer_reviews.author: aslterp59

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for sure
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! My family has played bingo so many times for fun during stay at home order. Definitely recommend getting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usable, but gave only half of the bingo cards promised
customer_reviews.text: Like: order came on time 👍 Dislike: Description stated there would be 100 bingo cards, but there was only a pack of 50 bingo cards. It was usable, but not as many as promised. I added a photo that shows it was a 50 count pack of bingo cards
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great game from beginning to end.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an event I was having which included elders in the community. It was such a good idea. They loved the game from the beginning to end they never wanted to stop.
customer_reviews.author: tay ware

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher I use these for my kiddos during indoor recess. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for benefit game, everyone had fun and final winner got the game as prize.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki K.

customer_reviews.title: This Bingo set fit into my suitcase easily, making it perfect to take on vacation
customer_reviews.text: This Bingo set fit into my suitcase easily, making it perfect to take on vacation. Also, the large cards worked great for early readers calling numbers, We had loads of fun with this Bingo set.
customer_reviews.author: drdeb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Everything you need to have Bingo Night.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The product is very easy to use. Numbers are large and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: jbadec99

customer_reviews.title: I didn't receive all my chips.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a birthday party expecting 1,000 chips. I had to separate them in individual bags of 25 and I was only able to fill 27 bags. Which means I was shorted 325 chips! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Valdez

customer_reviews.title: A Hit!
customer_reviews.text: We played the game as a family and ended up buying another one for a family who fell in love with the game also.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Custodio

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: I used this set for my graduation party and it was a hit! Definitely easy to read and keep track of the cards. Would definitely recommend to a friend !
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: worth the price.  Like it
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact it doesn't have the large, hand crank wire cage with bingo numbers. Easier to box and give for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Listless

customer_reviews.title: Only 50 cards were delivered with thi
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bundle, it was an excellent product. My only complaint is that it advertised 100 cards, I only received 50 pre-packaged color cards! I needed the other 50 for an upcoming event. This was disappointing, and inconvenient. I was left having to order an additional set.
customer_reviews.author: Becoming Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for size
customer_reviews.text: Bingo cards a little flimsy, cups good and call cards can be held up for sight purposes for individuals who are young and old.
customer_reviews.author: Gma 15

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The cards and plastic markers are good in quality and fun to use. Didnt know there was another option to call numbers aside from the usual noisy bingo cages... This way is by far easier, faster and less noisy. 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer :P

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for grandkids-I have had same thing for years, so wanted to buy another as a gift;love the fact that it comes with cards to call out the numbers
customer_reviews.author: TLB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. This game was simple to use and I love the cards. Much easier to use the cards instead of the ball cage.
customer_reviews.author: Zandra Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality bingo set !!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought kids wouldn't enjoy it since this is different from traditional bingo that comes cage and balls etc. This set is so much better and very high quality one. Kids really enjoy it and there is no balls flying around. Its like deck of cards and super easy to store. Highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: nbandi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used it with elementary age students. It was great to have the cards for them to see. I loved the number of cards and chips. The kids had a blast playing it! It was a good quality game.
customer_reviews.author: librarian/mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: Put pieces in small solo cups. Shot size. Everyone enjoyed. Quality
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Graham

customer_reviews.title: About time
customer_reviews.text: We Love the large and sturdy bingo cards. Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: It was good for the party I needed and everybody had a ...
customer_reviews.text: It was good for the party I needed and everybody had a great time. It should not cost anyone much to buy this version of bingo. Anyone can play this game simply and it is good at getting everyone at a party active and having a good time.
customer_reviews.author: europakey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Am having so much fun with it. On time. Will recommend to family and friends. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: YANIRA FRANCO

customer_reviews.title: BINGO LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: we love the bingo we all get together to play
customer_reviews.author: linda falcone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with small children
customer_reviews.text: More pieces yo combat a night without being bored.Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: dodo

customer_reviews.title: This is how to do bingo!
customer_reviews.text: Played this last night for a birthday party and had a great time! The cards are nicer than the ball cage. Anyone, any age can be the caller! Easier and quicker! Came with LOTS of cards and plastic markers! Great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth K.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for all ages. My 7 and 4 year old play it and love it!
customer_reviews.author: BuyItAll

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for so little money.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a big group party...we had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: tn_mama

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for Senior Adylts or any hearing impaired persons
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for Senior Adylts or any hearing impaired persons. The cards you call out from are large so you show it to them also. I use it with Senior Adults. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eager

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: These chips are much better than others I've ordered, as they don't have the sharp plastic nubs on them leftover from manufacturing. Cards are good quality and made it through Library Book Bingo with kids. Great deal, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: For Bingo lovers of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for our family reunion, and it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Grace G.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Easy to track the calling cards. Fun for family and kids.
customer_reviews.author: lil jr

customer_reviews.title: Professional product and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our Family Reunion. Easy to use and easy on the budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: At Thanksgiving this was the family after dinner game... we ALL had a blast playing bingo together, at least 10 people played, the ages range from 9 to 58 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Great hit
customer_reviews.text: This game was a big hit at our family gathering!
customer_reviews.author: SCC

customer_reviews.title: B I N G O
customer_reviews.text: Nice Bingo set. The calling cards are not as big as they look on-line but that's ok. Brought for my youngest son who love games. Makes for a fun family night especially if the prizes are cash money.
customer_reviews.author: Roz B

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Must buy! My son loves this and we played with it the moment it came in.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Big numbers on playing cards, easier for my 81 year old mother to see.
customer_reviews.text: Bingo cards are big and easy to see. There is enough cards and chips to share family, I purchased separate playing cards so each household will be able to host a bingo night.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I got it to play during Christmas and family get togethers. Family loved it. Very nice, sturdy playing cards and the bingo numbers/letters are on sturdy and clear, oversized cards. Had a blast over Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Betty R

customer_reviews.title: Bingo "B"udget conscience, "I"nteresting game, "N"ot difficult, "G"reat set and L"O"ts of fun BINGO!
customer_reviews.text: Great Game for family gathering during Christmas season. Cards are built well but bigger than regular cards - hard to shuffle. Will look for another smaller set of cards. Budget conscience
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Gilgunn & Old Lex Audio

customer_reviews.title: Bingo! This is a winner.
customer_reviews.text: For the price.. this is awesome. Have already used and it worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: vette girl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bingo game. Easy to use and no duplicates.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

product_meta.title: Bingo Royale Bundle | Complete Bingo Set with 1,000 Chips, 100 Cards, and Jumbo Deck of Calling Cards | All-Inclusive Kit for Schools, Rec Centers, Senior Homes, Charity Events, and Large Group Games
feature_bullets: ALL IN ONE: We've packed in everything you need to host a game of Bingo, no bulky cage or board required!
EASY READABILITY: The jumbo-format 5.25" x 3.25" calling cards are extra visible for fire hall and rec center games
UP TO 100 PLAYERS: The 100 mixed bingo cards are all unique, which means you can outfit up to 100 simultaneous players!
TOO MANY TRACKERS: The 1,000 mixed see-thru chips are 3/4" wide and easy to pick up thanks to their radius edge
PLENTY FOR ALL: Deck includes 8 blank replacement cards, instructions, and game variations for seasoned Bingo pros

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars941 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
